extDesc.message: One-click image-to-JPG conversion from any webpage. Your data never leaves your browser.

footerPrivacy.message: All image conversion happens 100% locally on your device — nothing is uploaded.

optionsSubtitle.message: Maximum quality by default • All processing happens locally • No data leaves your device

saveAsHint.message: If unchecked, files download directly to your default folder

donationText.message: Enjoying this extension? Consider supporting development!
